name: Get deals timeline
description: Returns open and won deals, grouped by a defined interval of time set in a date-type dealField (`field_key`) — e.g. when month is the chosen interval, and 3 months are asked starting from January 1st, 2012, deals are returned grouped into 3 groups — January, February and March — based on the value of the given `field_key`.
descriptionHtml: Returns open and won deals, grouped by a defined interval of time set in a date-type dealField (`field_key`) — e.g. when month is the chosen interval, and 3 months are asked starting from January 1st, 2012, deals are returned grouped into 3 groups — January, February and March — based on the value of the given `field_key`.
